title: SQL-Based Pipelines: Steampipe Makes All the World a Database
author: Andrew Brust
description: Want to use numerous APIs for popular platforms? Want to do it all with SQL, inside your database? Steampipe Anywhere is your ticket to ride.
cntitle: 基于 SQL 的管道：Steampipe 让全世界都成为数据库
cndescription: 想为流行平台使用大量 API？想在数据库中使用 SQL 完成所有操作？Steampipe Anywhere 是您的通行证。
